title: Watch the Microsoft Surface Event Right Now
text:
From Popular Mechanics

Tradition continues as Microsoft once again is debuting brand-new products at its annual October Surface Event, to be hosted in New York.

Here's how to watch and what to expect.

How to watch

-Microsoft's website: Have this web page loaded and ready to go for the event, which begins at 10 a.m. EST in New York.

-Twitter: If you want to watch the event and see people's reactions and instant memes, you'll want to check out the show by clicking here. Set yourself a reminder, too, so you don't forget to tune in.

See what’s next from Microsoft Surface from the live #MicrosoftEvent. Just five days to go, but you can set a reminder now.https://t.co/9Ha8FLiRo8 — Microsoft Surface (@surface) September 27, 2019

What we're expecting



Much of the potential hardware has been leaked already, so we have a good idea of what to expect, including—but not limited to—the following:

-Surface Pro 7

-Two Surface Laptop 3 models

-Surface 7 tablet with an advanced ARM processor, rather than an Intel chip (making it a rival to the brand-new iPad Pro)

-Project Centaurus: a possible dual-screen device that goes by this code name (watch out Samsung Fold).

-Windows Lite, a new version of the operating system could be announced

-A Surface Phone? (Maybe not so much, but it's been widely anticipated)

description: Rumor has it, we'll see a new Surface Pro 7, among other hardware.
